game.name: Terraformental
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Waking up alone in a derelict terraforming facility on an unknown (and distinctly not terraformed) planet, it's up to you to find a way to survive, learn what happened to the people who lived here and why you were abandoned in this narrative-driven incremental game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Waking up alone in a derelict terraforming facility on an unknown (and distinctly not terraformed) planet, it's up to you to find a way to survive, learn what happened to the people who lived here and why you were abandoned in this narrative-driven incremental game.
